comment: Smooth toffee borders on butterscotch. Full oily mouth feel. Splash of water and it really opens up. If you come across a bottle, it's worth the price
Picked up a bottle 12/29/15! Can't wait to try it...

Cherries on the nose, but there's a deeper note there that's a little interesting. Dark mellow taste at first, then switched from a dark fruit to a medicinal taste that lingers into the tail. Not even sure what all I'm tasting, but its certainly unique.
